username.description: Username for your Salesforce instance. Leave blank if using web based OAuth and Connected App.

password.description: Password for your Salesforce instance. Leave blank if using web based OAuth and Connected App.

production.description: Set true for production / developer instances, false for scratch or sandbox.

deployToWeb.description: Set true for express web app, false for CLI only.

publicKey.description: Public key of connected app.  Leave blank if using username / password.

privateKey.description: Private key of connected app.  Leave blank if using username / password.
